transcript.line1: Good morning, thank you for calling Smith Medical Centre. How can I help you?
transcript.line2: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Smith for next week.
transcript.line3: Of course. I can see Dr. Smith has availability on Tuesday at 10:00 AM or Thursday at 2:30 PM. Which works better for you?
transcript.line5: Excellent. I've booked Thursday at 2:30 PM for you. You'll receive a confirmation SMS shortly. Is there anything else I can help with?
transcript.line7: You're welcome. Have a great day!

useCases.label: Use Cases
useCases.description: From solo freelancers to multi-location enterprises, MrCall adapts to your industry, your workflow, and your customers.
useCases.readyDesc: Set up your AI phone agent in minutes. No hardware, no technical skills required.

freelancers.name: Freelancers
freelancers.tagline: Never miss a client call again.
freelancers.problem: As a freelancer, you are often busy with client work and cannot answer every phone call. Missed calls mean missed opportunities — potential clients move on to the next provider, and your reputation for responsiveness suffers.
freelancers.feature1Desc: MrCall answers calls when you are busy, capturing client details and intent automatically.
freelancers.feature2Desc: Let callers book available slots directly through your calendar integration.
freelancers.feature3Desc: Your agent answers common questions about your services, pricing, and availability.
freelancers.feature4Desc: Get real-time transcriptions and summaries so you never lose context.
freelancers.feature5Desc: Present a consistent, professional front even as a solo operator.

medicalPractices.name: Medical Practices
medicalPractices.tagline: Focus on patients, not the phone.
medicalPractices.problem: Medical practices handle dozens of calls daily — appointment requests, prescription inquiries, lab results. Staff are overwhelmed, patients wait on hold, and critical calls can be missed during busy hours.
medicalPractices.feature1Desc: Identify returning patients and greet them with personalized context from previous interactions.
medicalPractices.feature2Desc: Automate booking, rescheduling, and cancellations with calendar integration.
medicalPractices.feature3Desc: Reduce no-shows with automated reminder messages via WhatsApp or SMS.
medicalPractices.feature4Desc: Route urgent calls to the right staff member while handling routine inquiries autonomously.
medicalPractices.feature5Desc: Provide 24/7 phone coverage so patients always reach a helpful response.

realEstate.name: Real Estate
realEstate.tagline: Capture every lead, day and night.
realEstate.problem: Real estate agents are constantly on the move — showing properties, meeting clients, driving between locations. Incoming leads call once and if no one answers, they call the next agency. Speed of response is everything.
realEstate.feature1Desc: Every call is answered instantly, capturing buyer or seller intent and contact details.
realEstate.feature2Desc: Your agent provides details about listings, pricing, and availability from your knowledge base.
realEstate.feature3Desc: Callers can book property viewings directly through your synced calendar.
realEstate.feature4Desc: Intelligent questions qualify leads by budget, timeline, and preferences before you follow up.
realEstate.feature5Desc: Handle international buyers in their language with multilingual AI conversations.

restaurants.name: Restaurants
restaurants.problem: During peak hours, restaurant staff cannot answer the phone. Customers calling for reservations, menu questions, or directions are left waiting or simply hang up. Each missed call is a lost cover.
restaurants.feature1Desc: Accept, modify, and cancel reservations automatically with real-time table availability.
restaurants.feature2Desc: Instantly answer questions about your menu, allergens, opening hours, and specials.
restaurants.feature3Desc: Serve tourists and international guests in their own language.
restaurants.feature4Desc: Provide location details, parking info, and nearby landmarks to callers.
restaurants.feature5Desc: Handle group booking and private event requests with intelligent information gathering.

dealerships.name: Dealerships
dealerships.tagline: Convert more inquiries into test drives.
dealerships.problem: Dealerships receive high volumes of calls about inventory, pricing, financing, and service appointments. Sales staff on the floor cannot always pick up, and every missed call is a potential sale walking to a competitor.
dealerships.feature1Desc: Answer questions about available vehicles, features, and pricing from your connected database.
dealerships.feature2Desc: Let callers book test drives directly into your showroom calendar.
dealerships.feature3Desc: Handle routine service and maintenance bookings without burdening reception staff.
dealerships.feature4Desc: Capture caller details and intent, syncing directly to your CRM for sales follow-up.
dealerships.feature5Desc: Keep generating leads even when the showroom is closed.

propertyManagers.name: Property Managers
propertyManagers.tagline: Manage tenants without managing the phone.
propertyManagers.problem: Property managers juggle calls from tenants, prospective renters, contractors, and owners. Maintenance emergencies, rent inquiries, and showing requests pile up — and missing a critical call can mean costly delays.
propertyManagers.feature1Desc: Handle routine tenant inquiries about rent, lease terms, and building policies autonomously.
propertyManagers.feature2Desc: Log maintenance issues with details and urgency level, routing emergencies immediately.
propertyManagers.feature3Desc: Let prospective tenants book property viewings through your integrated calendar.
propertyManagers.feature4Desc: Keep property owners informed with automated summaries of tenant interactions.
propertyManagers.feature5Desc: One agent handles calls across your entire portfolio with property-specific knowledge.
